ygData.subject: RE: Where to go at low levels
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Wow, you ve spent all your time on the Northwestern side of the world.  Is this your 2nd character?   Since you need money, I wouldn t think so.  Get out
ygData.messageBody:
> I just want to start off by saying that this board has made my time as a
> young bard a real joy :-) keep up the good work.
> Now that I'm 21st level and have a bit of padding<1 /12 bub> on the exp
> bar I would like to know where is a good place to hunt at my level for
> exp/loot I am now at LakeRathe.
>
> 0-5 Qeynos/qeynos hills
> 5-8 Qeynos sewers Thugs/smuggs/sharkes
> 8-12 BB Giant Snakes
> 12-16 Noble Isle A.K.A. Wisp Isle in erud crossing
> 16-19 HighHold Orc Side
> 19-20 Lake Rathe 3 spawn Guard tower
> 20-21 South Karanas Hermit/Treants
> 21-25 ?
> 25-30 ?
> 30-40 ?
> 40-50 ?
>
> I need to hunt for exp and also loot I know that ppl say the loot gets
> better as you increase in level but I only have 9pp to my name after
> buying my armor<bronze> so I need to make some plat as well :-)
>
> Thanks for your help,
> *********************************
> Pinen Warsong
> Hopeless Bard of the Rathe
> Bard of the 21st Song
> *********************************
>
Wow, you've spent all your time on the Northwestern side of the
world. Is this your 2nd character? Since you need money, I wouldn't think
so. Get out and see the world! I'd recommend Unrest (can always find a
group), maybe CazicThule or Guk (bring your own group). Maybe try
Permafrost or even Everfrost (join a group hunting mammoths). You can try
Rathe Mountains (Giant skellies, monk skeletons). Most of the places you'll
need a group, but I've always been much more of a group fighter. If you
prefer to play solo, You should probably stay in the Karanas, fighting
Aviaks or some beetles may give xp at your level.

Bien - Karana
